title: Meeting Notes: Q4 Planning
content:
Key points discussed:
- Revenue targets for Q4
- New product launch timeline
- Team capacity planning
- Budget allocation for marketing

Action items:
1. Schedule follow-up with marketing team
2. Review resource allocation
3. Prepare presentation for stakeholders

title: Project Architecture Overview
content:
System components:
- Frontend: React with TypeScript
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Database: PostgreSQL
- Cache layer: Redis

API endpoints structure and authentication flow documented. Need to review scaling strategy.

title: Book Summary: Clean Code
content:
Important concepts:
- Meaningful names
- Functions should do one thing
- Comments should explain why, not what
- Test-driven development principles

Need to apply these concepts in our codebase review next week.

title: Weekly Goals
content:
This week's priorities:
1. Complete user authentication module
2. Review pull requests
3. Update documentation
4. Set up automated testing pipeline
5. Meet with UX team for feedback

title: Bug Investigation: Login Issues
content:
Users reporting intermittent login failures.
Potential causes:
- Session management
- Cache invalidation
- Network timeout

Steps to reproduce and current investigation status documented.

title: API Documentation Updates
content:
Updated endpoints:
- /users/profile
- /auth/refresh
- /api/v2/search

Added new authentication headers and rate limiting information. Swagger documentation updated.

title: Database Optimization Ideas
content:
Potential improvements:
1. Index optimization for search queries
2. Partition large tables
3. Implement query caching
4. Regular VACUUM analysis

Need to schedule maintenance window for implementation.

title: Design System Components
content:
New components added:
- Button variants
- Form elements
- Modal templates
- Toast notifications

Color scheme and typography guidelines updated. Need to create documentation.

title: Security Review Findings
content:
Key findings:
1. Dependencies need updating
2. Input validation improvements needed
3. SSL certificate expiring soon
4. Password policy update required

Prioritized list of fixes created for next sprint.

title: Learning Resources
content:
Useful links and resources:
- TypeScript advanced patterns course
- React performance optimization guide
- Docker best practices
- GraphQL workshop materials

Share with team during next knowledge sharing session.
